text: Ɗa ʋe-o, è-loun zunuiti be-o, ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti be-o, wa ɠɛɛzu tii ɠɛɛzu bɛ. Nii wa sɔlɔɔna, wo ʋaa la, naa ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga è-maliɠii ná-pɛlɛyeɠei ɠɔnɔgi. Mefiɓaale ɓɔɠɔi ɠa ɠɛɛzu laamiizu nà-taɓalii ɠa folo-o-folo.» Siɓa ma, zunu loun puugɔ maazu lɔɔlugɔ (15) ɠa é ɠɛni zea, ta botiɠɛ nu ʋuufelegɔ (20).
